name: Dicey and the Kingdom of Chance
name_original: Dicey and the Kingdom of Chance
description:
Important notes
  • This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, with the theme "Roll of the Dice".
  • The software I used to make this is Scratch, which is "the world’s largest coding community for children and a coding language with a simple visual interface that allows young people to create digital stories, games, and animations", made by the MIT Media Lab. This game is also available here.
  • Please tell me about any bugs or problems. Feedback is appreciated!
  • I'm going on holidays from July 17 to July 23, so I won't be able to log in, answer comments or rate other games until then.
  • I'm sure I won't win the jam or even appear in the video, but I had fun making this! :D
Story

The Kingdom of Chance is ruled by coins. While coins are rich and have a great life, dices can't almost eat. Dicey must take a chance and go on a long trip to defeat the Coin King and save the dices from starvation.

Instructions

Your journey will be in a random order caused by your uncontrolled rolling abilities - that means that you can start at any point, even defeating the final boss.

Jump on coins to kill them. When you have killed all coins, a flag will appear. Go there to finish the level. Get keys to open doors.

You'll know the controls in level 1 ;)

Credits

Programming, graphics and music: Happy Wombat

Sound Effects: Scratch library

Tools: Scratch, Music Lab
